Posted By: norbit444 (7/4/2009 11:41:25 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Great card. Even though I'm playing a white/blue/sub-black control esper deck, I sub out some of the control for these walls against hard green/white/red decks. A [Woolly Thoctar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Woolly Thoctar) combined with a [Knight Of New Alara](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Knight Of New Alara) breaks through it though. For a measly 4 mana as well! ):   
  
Nonetheless, its shroud gives invincibility to cards like [Path To Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path To Exile), [Call To Heel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Call To Heel) or [Unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unsummon). Its stable toughness magnitude of 8 makes it difficult for other creatures to break through too. A solid 4/5.
posts.html:
Great card. Even though I'm playing a white/blue/sub-black control esper deck, I sub out some of the control for these walls against hard green/white/red decks. A Woolly Thoctar combined with a Knight Of New Alara breaks through it though. For a measly 4 mana as well! ):

Nonetheless, its shroud gives invincibility to cards like Path To Exile, Call To Heel or Unsummon. Its stable toughness magnitude of 8 makes it difficult for other creatures to break through too. A solid 4/5.
